author: barnabasbusa
content: we have enabled https://beacon.sepolia.ethpandaops.io feel free to test out different client implementations

author: barnabasbusa
content: we have supernodes behind all of them

author: philngo
content:
We reimplemented it here: https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/pull/8506
You can try with our sepolia node to see if it's serving what you need <@459963806450450432>

author: barnabasbusa
content:
by default it will RR your requestes with sticky TCP sess, but you can specify client specific calls with:
`curl https://beacon.sepolia.ethpandaops.io/eth/v1/node/version\?dugtrio-next-endpoint\=prysm`

author: barnabasbusa
content: did this make it into your latest release?

author: jakubgs
content: empty messages as far as I know

author: philngo
content: Yes, it's in v1.35.0

author: agnxsh
content: Not yet, in case you mean beacon API

author: leeederek
content: What do you mean "not yet", isn't blobs_sidecar the previous API for blobs?

author: tersec
content: https://ethereum.github.io/beacon-APIs/#/Beacon/getBlobSidecars is deprecated

author: tersec
content: It was never specified to support blobs in the context of where clients are storing columns

author: kingy__
content: noting this endpoint is deprecated, lighthouse will support getBlobSidecars for supernodes post fusaka for a while in order to give people time to migrate.
